results.query: Report the Gross Margin (or Net Interest Margin, if a bank) over the last 5 quarters, with values.
results.answer:
**Gross Margin (Last 5 Quarters)**  

| Quarter | Gross Margin |
|---------|--------------|
| 2Q 24   | 2.14 % |
| 3Q 24   | 2.11 % |
| 4Q 24   | 2.15 % |
| 1Q 25   | 2.12 % |
| 2Q 25   | 2.05 % |

The margin has generally hovered around 2.1 %, with a modest decline observed in 2Q 25.

results.query: Show Operating Expenses for the last 3 fiscal years, year-on-year comparison.
results.answer:
**Operating Expenses (SGD million)**  

| Fiscal Year | Operating Expenses |
|-------------|--------------------|
| 2022 | 7,090 |
| 2023 | 8,291 |
| 2024 | 9,018 |

Operating expenses have risen each year, climbing from 7,090 million SGD in 2022 to 9,018 million SGD in 2024.

results.query: Calculate the Operating Efficiency Ratio (Opex ÷ Operating Income) for the last 3 fiscal years, showing the working.
results.answer:
**Operating Efficiency Ratio (Opex ÷ Operating Income)**  

| Fiscal Year | Operating Expenses (SGD m) | Operating Income (SGD m) | Ratio (%) |
|-------------|---------------------------|--------------------------|-----------|
| 2022 | 7,090 | 16,502 | 43.0 |
| 2023 | 8,291 | 20,180 | 41.1 |
| 2024 | 9,018 | 22,297 | 40.4 |

**Key trend:** The ratio has steadily declined over the past three years, indicating improving operating efficiency.
